DOC.brief_summary: For breech presentation , cesarean section rate decrease external cephalic version . This painful operation , rare serious complication . The aim trial evaluate effectiveness acupuncture-moxibustion , non-invasive technique , correct breech presentation 37 week gestation .
DOC.detailed_description: Monocentric control randomize trial simple blind fashion , compare acupuncture-moxibustion versus placebo singleton pregnancy breech presentation 33+5 35+5 week gestation . The intervention arm consist acupuncture-moxibustion BL67 acupuncture point , six seance twenty minute two day apart . In placebo group , cold light inactivate laser applied point time . When cephalic version fail , manual external cephalic version propose . The main outcome measure cephalic presentation 37+2 week gestation .
DOC.criteria: breech presentation , SINGLETON maternal age 18 an 45 , multiple gestation , fetal uterine malformation , premature rupture membrane
